headline: JPMorgan raises Interpublic Group rating on Omnicom’s all-stock deal
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan raised its rating on for Interpublic Group to "overweight,” also lifting its price target to $39 from $32 following Omnicom’s announcement of an all-stock acquisition. Under the deal, Omnicom will exchange 0.344 OMC shares for each IPG share, with the transaction expected to close by year-end.
